insertCountry: INSERT INTO direction.country (na_country) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id_country
insertState: INSERT INTO direction.state (id_country, na_state) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_state
insertCity: INSERT INTO direction.city (id_state, na_city) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_city
insertMuni: INSERT INTO direction.municipality (id_city, na_municipality) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_municipality
insertStreet: INSERT INTO direction.street (id_municipality, na_street) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_street
updateMuni: UPDATE direction.municipality SET na_municipality = $1 WHERE id_municipality = $2
updateStreet: UPDATE direction.street SET na_street = $1 WHERE id_street = $2
selectDirectionByRoute: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country  WHERE rt.id_route = $1
selectDirectionByLocal: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_local INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country  WHERE lc.id_local= $1
selectAddressByPerson: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM person.person pn INNER JOIN person.address ad ON ad.id_address = pn.id_address INNER JOIN direction.street st ON st.id_street = ad.id_street  INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality  INNER JOIN direction.city ct ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city  INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state  INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country   WHERE pn.id_person = $1
selectAllDirection: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN direction.street st ON rt.id_street = st.id_street INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality INNER JOIN direction.city ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country
selectAllAddress: SELECT st.na_street, mn.na_municipality, ct.na_city, sta.na_state, cty.na_country FROM person.address ad INNER JOIN direction.street st ON ad.id_street = st.id_street  INNER JOIN direction.municipality mn ON mn.id_municipality = st.id_municipality  INNER JOIN direction.city ON ct.id_city = mn.id_city  INNER JOIN direction.state sta ON sta.id_state = ct.id_state  INNER JOIN direction.country cty ON cty.id_country = sta.id_country
